attributes.background: EVERYDAY DOGS ARE KILLED JUST BECAUSE THEY ARE A TPE OF BREED, THIS IS WRONG! SICKENING! AND HEARTBREAKNG. SIGN UP AND PUT AND END TO THESE POOR DOGS DEATHS JUST BECAUSE OF THEIR BREED

rejection.details: If you want Parliament to repeal the Dangerous Dogs Act, you could start a new petition about that. It's not clear from your current petition what action you want to see.
